story.text: What we need is a basic [[Tool Kit]] -- [[Thinking Out Loud]] [[Donald Noyes]].20080407
This is what one needs to perform certain mechanical things on objects the [[Ordinary Computer Users]] will be found possessing.
The User who wants to do much can do so with suites which have been produced, utilized and proved to be successful.
[[Open Office]] and [[Microsoft Office]] are two such suites.
